import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './modal-tweet.module.css' import Photo from '../photo' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {Close} from '../icons' import ThemeButton from '../theme-button' var layout= [] function ModalTweet({onClick= () => {}}) { const [idea,setIdea]=useState([]) sessionStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.stringify('HOŞGELDİNİZ')) const onSubmit= (e) => { var yeni=JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('TEXT')) layout=yeni.map((gelen,index)=> layout[index]=gelen) console.log('LAYOUT', layout); e.preventDefault() layout.push( idea) sessionStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.stringify(layout)) onClick(false) } return (
{/* Header */}
